price: The Messenger’s duty is only to convey the message; Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
